nodes.text: Lake Paonga was a lake on the edge of Lianorm Swamp on Naboo, lying east of Otoh Sancture, that served as the entrance to the Gungan city of Otoh Gunga.
The Paonga Strait connected Otoh Gunga to the Gungan Sacred Place, at the foot of the Gallo Mountains.
The lake was known to be rich in gooberfish.
